subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Scoop Jardine had 17 points and 7 assists Saturday to help No. 17 Syracuse beat No. 11 Georgetown, 58-51, in the Hoyas’ first game without the injured senior point guard Chris Wright.
snippet: Scoop Jardine had 17 points and 7 assists Saturday to help No. 17 Syracuse beat No. 11 Georgetown, 58-51, in the Hoyas’ first game without the injured senior point guard Chris Wright.
